Source.Name: scummvm
Source.Summary: ScummVM is a program which allows you to run certain classic graphical point-and-click adventure games, provided you already have their data files.
Source.Description: ScummVM is a program which allows you to run certain classic graphical point-and-click adventure games, provided you already have their data files. The clever part about this: ScummVM just replaces the executables shipped with the games, allowing you to play them on systems for which they were never designed!
